notes: Low-frequency safe mixing mode targeting PFBS and TP dilution without shoreline stress; anchored to CAP PFBS detection and TP levels.
Mode correlated with E. coli accumulation damped by cyboquatic actuation; supports ADEQ E. coli impairment reductions.
Safe canal mixing mode designed from 1D advection–diffusion to minimize nutrient and salinity stagnation zones.
Large-scale mode aligned with salinity-control program (≈1.3 Mt/year reduction) while respecting structural limits on banks and dams.
Controlled pond experiment for validating cyboquatic resonance predictions and energy-per-ton pollutant reduction metrics.
